display_information.description: Create and summarize Jira tickets effortlessly with JiraMate, your AI-powered issue assistant.
display_information.long_description:

Create tickets with interactive modals, attach files, mention teammates, and even summarize any existing issue using the `/summarize` command. JiraMate also prevents duplicates by showing AI-generated summaries of similar tickets before creation. Plus, with a dedicated Home tab and a built-in assistant in DMs, you can view, discuss, and understand Jira tickets in one seamless experience.
